RemotePilotTrainingOrganization.description: Garuda Aerospace delivers advanced drone pilot training in accordance with Rule 39 of the Drone Rules 2021, with DGCA approval for Remote Pilot Training Organization (RPTO).

CenterOfExcellence.description: The Center of Excellence (CoE) aims to empower youth and create a vibrant drone ecosystem by establishing industry-driven centers at Higher Education Institutions (HEIs). HEIs will engage in UAV research activities with active guidance and collaboration.

DroneTraining.description: Learn from India’s most qualified and experienced drone training instructors with a focus on practical learning. Well-equipped labs provide the latest simulation software and tools, preparing students for real-world applications.

InterestedInSettingUpCoE.description: For institutions interested in setting up a Center of Excellence (CoE), Garuda Aerospace provides guidance and expertise to establish research activities focused on UAVs, engaging both students and faculty members in industry-driven problems.
